Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly good hotel in a rather down market area!”
Reviews.Author: YeovilSS
Reviews.Content: easily missed driven past times seeing hotel ideal stayed 3 nights found tidy clean quiet comfortable hotel car park £15 night book advance business destination attractions nearby families guests eateries appealed fish chips night eat ate afield nights kent road isnt evenings stroll bit market didnt breakfast cant comment value suited fine

Reviews.Title: “Only if needs be....”
Reviews.Author: EmilyAnna1990
Reviews.Content: late review sorry stayed november friends 21st ministry sound night outthe run hotel proximity club tube station easier buses central london drag suitcases walk 20 odd minutes didnt spend time nor hotel clean comfortable tea coffee facilities tv hot power shower bathroom situated busy road facing windows kept noise hours sleep run safe hotel coming hours recommend night dont expect price pay

Reviews.Title: “A great find!”
Reviews.Author: 186259Donna
Reviews.Content: travel london regularly previously stayed aldgate east travel lodge hotel huge single traveller booked late bathroom bath shower bathroom spotlessly clean staff friendly inviting hotel pretty quiet rare bonus secure car park attached hotel £10 charge worth walk car park straight hotel dining breakfast claustrophobic dingy managed table 3 occasions stayed im breakfast worth £10 charging balance hotel consistently respect

Reviews.Title: “Not bad at all for a stopover if you need to be near there - but not near tower bridge”
Reviews.Author: J&JWOxfordshire
Reviews.Content: giving stars cheap accommodation london standards dont expecting star hotel isnt recommend base holiday seeing london stopped night south river kent road pretty run parking reasonably secure clean reception ok polite staff brimming enthusiasm shower ok agree draining quickly bit noise street sirens main top floor acceptable bearing mind location tuesday weekend quieter colleague stayed quiet night request chinese attached hotel castle food normal cantonese fayre proper szechuan food real adventure trek curry chinese decision wandered look nice little pub decided 3 4 mins walk nice pub kent road probably wishful thinking walked maybe wrong hotel little bar reception anyway

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Leonard P
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hotel excellent nice modern flat screen tv remote nice bathroom shower clean hallways smelt hospitals smell heard noise bed comfortable staff helpfull bus times bus stop 100 yards hotel buses run 10 mins tourist sights theatres standard charge £220 single ticket 24 hour sevice easy hotel spent £300 taxi fares time approx £50 paid hotel definately recommend hotel enjoyable stay london

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: stepyjk
Reviews.Content: hotel nice clean cheap sleeping getting changed transport fine bus stop outside underground walk road ion world wasnt paying stay super glam hotel suited staff helpful hotel reception bus routes main attractions helpful nice comfy near lift bit noise mornign people coming inout fault hotel noisy neighbours chinese restaurant looked nice unfortunatly didnt chance sample am nice

Reviews.Title: “So clean but so noisey”
Reviews.Author: hobbybobby1
Reviews.Content: stayed night sole purpose visiting tower reviewed previous traveller location poor elephant castle tube nightmare walk negotiating subways crossings hotel allocated front quietest nights sleep reviewed travel hotel definitely black cab busthe cab booked reception private cab whos driver wasnt visitors entrance tower plus clean comfortable price stay pay little extra conveniently situated hotel

Reviews.Title: “If you want a very clean and comfortable room and don't mind a dreadful location, this is the hotel to choose.”
Reviews.Author: Norwaycalling
Reviews.Content: shared double teenage son ive stayed tiny overpriced bayswater appreciated spacious comfortable modern bathroom spotless incredibly hairdryer excellent deal bookingcom matter dire hotel werent complaining standard rates displayed lobby gbp 99 night double ok hotel tower bridge cant walk nearest tube elephant castle nice stroll pretty streets walk absolutely miserable honestly spooky nice town taxi tube station time stay youve amazing deal splash taxis time paid gbp 39 night deals rare lucky staff reserved quiet help dont expect huge smiles receptionist material freezing boiling managed suss air conditioning system time windows locked fresh air available mind street noisy forget sleeping window anyway ambulances police cars fire trucks road 10 mins night yep bring ear plugs facing bought english breakfast elephant castle tube wetherspoons half price hotel breakfast stay hotel female traveller travelling ok theres restaurant access hotel lobby food authentic nb handful london slapped service charge 10 stated menu otherwise annoyed hotel excellent value london standards youre paying standard rate surprisingly clean modern comfortable real shame placed horrible spot tube bus stop outside hotel buses london traffic harder tourists negotiate userfriendly tube wouldnt stay wouldnt recommend thats location youre backpacker dont mind rough recommend highly basically hotel terrible location

Reviews.Title: “Not too bad”
Reviews.Author: Xaine05
Reviews.Content: stayed 10 nights hotel alright nearest tube station 20 mins walk smart travel card oyster card bus outside hotel drop elephant castle station buses 53 172 minutes staff english price using wireless internet complete rip £300 30 mins phone call warned call unless downstairs pay call credit cleaned daily bare minimum clean sheets arent replaced poorer town scared threatened laundry laundry service youll laundrette street value fast machines helpful attendant little move door cleaned lot floor space youre cramped maybe definitely larger ones safe lock valuables leave

Reviews.Title: “Spoilt our weekend”
Reviews.Author: RT2220
Reviews.Content: night stay 12 daughter approx £600 worth property stolen called police half past midnight scene investigating hotel allowed strangers unattended whilst theatre hotel communicating refused refund tariff suggest hotel removed vist london website traveller especially overseas stressful experience london bad name

Reviews.Title: “Don't pay the full price”
Reviews.Author: engam
Reviews.Content: hotel walking distance nearest tube station elephant castle catch bus hotel consider lots luggages cramped stuff hardly move banging knees onto sharp corners mattress housed box wooden bed hard tuck bedsheet mattress attendant simply tucked mattress sheet crumbled immediately lied towels recycled cleaning rags floor uncarpeted days sticky walk didnt vacuum floor stayover price 89 gbp night considered priced considering quality location breakfast 10 gbp head finished 9am internet access cost extra discount reservation sites hotel own website attractive option price 60 night

Reviews.Title: “Grotty and basic”
Reviews.Author: josiepuds
Reviews.Content: stayed hotels london business worst local run intimidating feel arrived hotel staff communication limted sent stank cigarettes smoke moved ok basic bar soap provided cofee cups spoon crusty iron looked hazzard shower brave neighbourhood buy shower gel £100 night provided none wont

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and price for London”
Reviews.Author: pinkladytiff83
Reviews.Content: friend late twenties decided weekend london looking cheap half decent hotel perfect check smooth fantastically clean modern spacious bus stop minute takes central london takes 20mins location slight downside bit confusing nearest tube elephant castle tower bridge expect reception staff helpful giving directions etc kent road street london cheapest plot monopoly board apart lovely modern hotel nights stay

Reviews.Content: arrived hotel 900 pm travelled euston recommend woman hotel clean showers dirty recommend travellers book online check credit card signature photocopied correct copied heated discussion gentleman copied card eventually recommend hotel stay bad experience
